The Bible-bearer. By A.N. sometimes of Trinity Colledge in Oxford Newman, Arthur.
[46] p.
By W[illiam] I[aggard] for I[effrey] C[horlton] and are to be sold at the north doore of Paules, Printed at London : 1607.
A.N. = Arthur Newman. Signatures: A-F⁴ (-F4). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
